sentences.english: Meanwhile, the main methods of preserving health is summed up.
sentences.chinese: 归纳了中医学健康状态调摄的主要方式。

sentences.english: Nursing the body after the disease and excluding the harmful factors are very important.
sentences.chinese: 病后调摄，调体为先，排除不良因素。

sentences.english: At forty every man is a fool or his own physician.
sentences.chinese: 人到四十，若非蠢材，当知调摄。
